Mutations in LRPAP1 are associated with severe myopia in humans.

name: LDL receptor related protein associated protein 1
other_names: low density lipoprotein receptor-related protein associated protein 1
low density lipoprotein-related protein-associated protein 1 (alpha-2-macroglobulin receptor-associated protein 1)

pid.name: Signaling events mediated by the Hedgehog family
Lissencephaly gene (LIS1) in neuronal migration and development

summary: This gene encodes a protein that interacts with the low density lipoprotein (LDL) receptor-related protein and facilitates its proper folding and localization by preventing the binding of ligands. Mutations in this gene have been identified in individuals with myopia 23. Alternative splicing results in multiple transcript variants. [provided by RefSeq, Dec 2013].
